actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to restrict the Federal Government from preempting or interfering with State statutes pertaining to spousal abuse, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Prohibits Federal preemption of State laws relating to spousal abuse or domestic relations. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to grant tax-exempt status to nonprofit organizations operated for the purpose of providing treatment and care for victims of domestic violence or abuse.

titles.title: A bill to restrict the Federal Government from preempting or interfering with State statutes pertaining to spousal abuse, and for other purposes.
